channel.title: New to Coding
channel.description:
Hey guys, My name is Crome and I'm new to Game Coding (RSPS) --> I have coded websites before but only using Note Pad. I was just wondering if anyone could help me out as in:
- Show/Tell me where and how to get started - Explain to me how to code a RSPS - Tell me about any software I'll need. (But I probably have most of it lol) - And if anyone wants to join along in the coding :)
I will probably be working my way up from a 317 server and mastering that and then moving through all the way to a 613/614 eventually :)
PLEASE REPLY or send me a message at: packunchained@hotmail.com
(Btw, I have hosted RSPS servers but I never launched them or obviously coded them)
Thanks -SHADOW (Crome)
<Edit> (4.50pm) --> I am willing to pay in a small range for someone to help me get started.. <Edit>

item.title: New to Coding
item.dc:creator: @CromE-MaGiic CromE-MaGiic
item.description:
@CromE-MaGiic wrote:

Lol dude, I have hosted RSPS’, just not online.
I also play Runescape (Lvl 134) Iknow that game is a Java program lol…

Do you have skype? Maybe you can help me with audio?

SOO CAN SOMEONE HELP ME?

Read full topic

item.title: New to Coding
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You could get started in either learning to make your own server, or going to the downloads board and looking at various other downloads to choose from.

At the moment with most senior members on the forums, their wanting to see people program base’s like RuneSource, and Hyperion. Project-Insanity at the moment is being overused, however, I personally don’t care.

RSPS is programmed in Java.

You could use Notepad, but it’s recommended to use either Eclipse, Netbeans, or Notepad++

Read full topic
